data.tweet: Chelsea were aggressive when out of possession, making four challenges in the final third. Milan made zero challenges in their attacking third.
Chelsea played 40 passes into the final third (Milan played 14) and carried the ball into the final third 32 times (Milan did so nine times).
sentences: Chelsea managed to play an impressive 40 successful balls into the final third.
This season, Milan have averaged 29 passes into the last third per 90 minutes.
